settings.content: Uno - Multi Store Responsive Shopify Theme
See the theme [Landing page and document](http://landing.engotheme.com/shopify/uno) for more information about this wonderful theme.

If you love this theme, please [Rate 5 stars](https://themeforest.net/item/uno-multi-store-responsive-shopify-theme/reviews/19244984), which will be a great motivation for us to continue create great themes in the future. [How to rate?](http://landing.engotheme.com/library/how-to-rate.png)

settings.label: Summary
settings.default: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
